title: BRIEF-Taiwan's UMC repurchased shares worth T$300 mln
text:
BRIEF-Taiwan's UMC repurchased shares worth T$300 mln Sept 4 
Sept 4 United Microelectronics Corp 
* Says repurchased shares worth T$300 million ($9.23 million) 
Source text in English: {ID:nTwn488nJm] 
Further company coverage: ($1 = 32.4950 Taiwan dollars) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom) Trending On Reuters
